text: Sengaku is known as Buddhist monk of the Tendai school, scholar, editor and a literary critic from Japan.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric et al. (2005). "Senkaku" in ; n.b., Louis-Frédéric is pseudonym of Louis-Frédéric Nussbaum, see Deutsche Nationalbibliothek Authority File . He was born in 1203 and died in 1273. == References == Category:1203 births Category:1272 deaths
title: Sengaku
